modal.details: This application is intended to be used only by employees throughout the Modis/Akkodis global sales department. It is a platform where employees from all over the world can enter, search and view the won and completed projects, as well as check the specifics related to each project. For example: how many and what teams worked on it, how much time and money it cost, what technologies were used, what results were achieved, and etc.

This project was a team work. But my personal contribution is:
•	Creating and maintaining of web pages and components by given template design in Figma on VueJS 2 using JavaScript, HTML, CSS and SASS.
•	Integrating of external libraries such as: “vue-router”, “i18n” for translations, “vue-msal” for sign-in from active directories,"particles”, “axios”, “animate.css”, and others.
•		have personally created approx.75% of the front-end on the app which I’m working on with the team.
•	Creating new REST endopoints on the back-end using Java, Spring Framework, Spring Data JPA, Hibernate, and MySQL.
•	Implementing and extending of the project business logic using Domain Driven Design and Hexagonal Architecture such as login, search, CRUD and etc.
•	Contribution to the integration of external dependencies as: AWS S3, AWS translation, generating of PDF, PPT, and DOCX documents
•	I have personally refactored 65% of the back-end and the database (with liquidbase) in order to improve/optimize the performance.
•	Part of the projects that implements Agile methodologies and Scrum practices
